name: jwing - the next puzzle game
detailed_description:
jwing - the next puzzle game

Drop weighted coloured balls onto scales, matching three or more balls horizontally in order to score points. But be careful, as the scales adjust to the weight on them, they can tip changing the field to your advantage, detriment or worse - a game over : when the piles of balls become too high they collapse, ending the game.

Aside from core gameplay, version 1.0.0 comes with the following unlockable features :
* Black Holes
* Laser Balls
* Magic Balls
* Magnetic Balls

In future free updates you can expect the following :
* Two player couch co-op
* Two player couch battle
* Unlockable Medium and Hard difficulty levels
* Many more unlockable ball types
* Steam Achievements and Leader Board
* French and German localisation

short_description: An indie casual strategy game with fascinating gameplay mechanics. Think tetris meets a match three bubble shooter with a dynamically changing field. Easy to learn, difficult to master, with endless replay value. Develop strategies and unlock features to climb up levels and achieve the best score.
